title: AS Roma appoint Gian Piero Gasperini as new Head Coach

title: Roma appoint Ranieri as new head coach - AS Roma
snippet: AS Roma is pleased to announce that Claudio Ranieri is the new Head Coach of the First Team.

title: Roma appoint De Rossi as new head coach - AS Roma
snippet: After an 18-year playing career with AS Roma, De Rossi will return home as head coach, with his first game being the club's upcoming Serie A match against Verona on Saturday evening at the Stadio Olimpico.

title: AS Roma - Wikipedia
snippet: In turn, NEEP owned all shares held previously by Sensi (about 67%) with the rest free float in the stock market. UniCredit later disinvested NEEP Roma Holding to sell to "AS Roma SPV, LLC" and Pallotta. The new ownership hired Walter Sabatini as director of football and former Spanish international and Barcelona B coach Luis Enrique as manager.
